text.div:
Campylobacteriosis (Tests for Campylobacter species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org

    16528-2 Campylobacter coli rRNA [Units/volume] in Serum by Probe
